name: Scandal: Interactive Stories
description:
You choose your story! Discover School for Scandal for yourself. This amazing college drama story has fantasy and romance throughout. Our simulation game lets you date and meet friends in college as well as flirt with a teacher or even party by the pool. Role playing has never been this fun! Life is strange and full of drama as a student at Cosgrove College, how will your choices fair?

Start your own story and customize your character as you navigate the interactive chapters.
There are no secrets or moments that are safe from the prying eyes in School for Scandal. The choices you make in each episode and the journeys you take will decide how your story ends.

Download one of the best roleplay games today:
- Customize the character you play with
- You choose the outfit and style
- Who will be your roommate?
- Will you fall in love?
- What will you wear to the party?
- Play for free or upgrade to premium scenes and outfits
- More stories coming soon!

Privacy Policy & Terms of Service
